name: Potemkin
description: Potemkin is a sandbox strategy game! Build any map you can imagine! Conquer your enemies! Play on massive maps with hundreds of players at once! Simulate any real or fictional war! Play against a very strong and flexible artificial intelligence. Share your maps simply by copy-pasting them onto Reddit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Core (64 bit) Memory: 17 MB RAM Storage: 10 MB available space
